Container.Name: whoogle-search
Container.Overview:
Get Google search results, but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address tracking. Easily deployable in one click as a Docker app, and customizable with a single config file. Quick and simple to implement as a primary search engine replacement on both desktop and mobile.
Check out https://github.com/benbusby/whoogle-search for more environmental configuration options.
Container.DonateText: ​ If you appreciate my work please consider buying me a coffee, cheers! 😁 ​
Container.Description:
Get Google search results, but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address tracking. Easily deployable in one click as a Docker app, and customizable with a single config file. Quick and simple to implement as a primary search engine replacement on both desktop and mobile.
Check out https://github.com/benbusby/whoogle-search for more environmental configuration options.

Config.Name: Proxy Type
Config.Description: The type of proxy server. Can be socks5, socks4, or http. Optional.

Config.Name: Proxy Location
Config.Description: The location of the proxy server (host or ip). Optional.

Config.Name: Alternative Twitter frontend
Config.Description: The twitter.com alternative to use if alternatives are check in WebUI config. For example, nitter.net or a local instance. Optional.

Config.Name: Alternative YouTube frontend
Config.Description: The youtube.com alternative to use if alternatives are check in WebUI config. For example, invidious.snopyta.org or a local instance. Optional.

Config.Name: Alternative Instagram frontend
Config.Description: The instagram.com alternative to use if alternatives are check in WebUI config. For example, bibliogram.art or a local instance. Optional.

Config.Name: Alternative Reddit frontend
Config.Description: The reddit.com alternative to use if alternatives are check in WebUI config. For example, libredd.it or a local instance. Optional.

Config.Name: Alternative Google Translate frontend
Config.Description: The Google Translate alternative to use if alternatives are check in WebUI config. This is used for all translate_ searches. For example, lingva.ml or a local instance. Optional.
